Products.ProductName: Girls Full Zip Water Jacket - Black Stripes - 2T ** SALE ITEM NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN **
Products.Photo_AltText: Sizes 2T-6 feature a stylish bottom ruffle detail
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing:
Our girls water jacket is perfect for any outdoor activity including play dates in the park, a day at the beach, or fishing with dad. This lightweight, breathable jacket is quick drying and certified UPF 50+ to ensure maximum sun protection. Chlorine and salt water resistant. Certified UPF 50+
Sizes 2T-6 feature a stylish bottom ruffle detail.
Products.ProductFeatures:
• Sizes 2T-6 feature bottom ruffle detail
  • Stylish contrast stitching
  • High neck collar
  • Lightweight, quick drying fabric
  • Color changing UV detector zipper pull
  • Optional thumb holes for additional hand protection
  • Full zipper track features fabric lining to prevent discomfort and chafing
  • Flat-lock seams
  • Shape retaining four-way stretch
  • Certified UPF 50+

Products.ProductName: Boys SS 1/2 Zip Sun Shirt
Products.METATAG_Description: This UV Skinz Boy's Short Sleeve 1/2 Zip Sun Shirt is lightweight, soft, and comfortable. Order this sun protective half zip shirt to keep your children protected!
Products.METATAG_Title: Sun Protective Half Zip Shirt | Kids Half Zip Sun Shirt
Products.ProductNameShort: Boys Short Sleeve Half-Zip Sun Shirt
Products.ProductFeatures:
Our Boys Short Sleeve Half Zip Sun Shirt is lightweight, quick drying, and may be the softest shirt youll ever touch! Made with our new polyester warp knit fabric, our Boys Half-Zip is a fashionable choice for all-day comfort and reliable sun protection while playing outdoors. Features a quarter length zipper for adjustable exposure and easy on/off functionality. This sun protective half zip shirt is certified UPF 50+. This kids half zip sun shirt is chlorine and salt water resistant.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Buttery Soft Polyester Warp Knit Sun Fabric
  • Shape Retaining Four-Way Stretch
  • Lightweight and Quick Drying
  • Color Changing, UV Detecting Zipper-Pull
  • Flat-Lock Seams
  • Body Length for Size 6 is 18" as Measured from Side Neck to Hem
  • Easy Care: Machine Wash, Line Dry
  • Imported

Products.METATAG_Description: A pullover that is versatile and fashionable. Made from our lightweight, breathable knit pique fabric this sun shirt is a classic piece for any sun activity.
Products.METATAG_Title: Sun Protective Half-Zip Ruched Long Sleeve Sun Shirt for Women
Products.Photo_AltText: SPF/UPF 50+ - Half-Zip Ruched Summer Sun Clothing for Ladies
Products.ProductNameShort: Womens LS 1/2 Zip Ruched Sun Shirt
Products.ExtInfo:
• Rinse in cool water after every use
  • Machine wash in cold gentle cycle with mild soap and lay flat to dry
  • Do not spin dry, soak, bleach, dry clean, iron or store when wet
  • Remove all sand grains in garment by carefully washing and/or stretching and tapping sand out of garment when it is dry
  • Avoid rough surfaces such as concrete and rough swimming pool decks as these may damage your garment
  • Avoid harsh chemicals in heated spas and saunas as these may breakdown the fibers of your garment
  • Avoid direct contact with sunscreen as this may stain the fabric
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing: A pullover that is versatile and fashionable. Made from our lightweight, breathable knit pique fabric this sun shirt is a classic piece for any sun activity. Stylish ruching detail at the side contours to your body. Contrasting colors at collar and zipper adds interest. UV Sun detector zipper pull changes colors in the sun. Flat lock stitched seams throughout, heat transferred label and covered neck seam are smooth next to skin for zero irritation. Quick drying fabric offers a full range of motion for any activity. Chlorine and salt water resistant. Certified UPF 50+.
Products.ProductFeatures:
• Certified UPF 50+,Half-zip at neckline
  • UV sun detector zipper pull changes color in the sun
  • Lightweight and Quick Drying pique knit fabric
  • Flat lock seams
  • Chlorine and salt water resistant
